definitions.text: the money risked on a gamble

examples: he did it on a bet

definitions.text: maintain with or as if with a bet
examples: I bet she will be there!

definitions.text: stake on the outcome of an issue
examples: I bet $100 on that new horse
She played all her money on the dark horse
you can count on me to help you any time
Look to your friends for support
Depend on your family in times of crisis
